title: Why does Jesus say a Slave-owning Occupying Soldier has more faith than God’s people?
description:
In the middle of the Judean culture war Jesus heals the slave of an occupying servant. Why would he do such a thing? Luke 7

Through the Eye of the Needle https://amzn.to/3jlT6mW
Dominion by Tom Holland https://amzn.to/3pYmlyE

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/jdVk8XU
